pr_title: Display built-in functions first in SHOW FUNCTIONS results

timeline.message: Display built-in functions first in SHOW FUNCTIONS results

timeline.bodyText: This says ASCENDING. I'm very confused. >_< Could you add a test?
timeline.author: rongrong
